settings.question: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: We ship all orders the following business day after your order is placed. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking information once your order is shipped. Most orders will arrive within 3-5 business days.

settings.question: Where do your products ship from?
settings.answer: All products ship from our facility in Ohio, USA.

settings.question: Do you offer discounts?
settings.answer: Yes! We send out monthly discounts to subscribers of 'Tom's Letter' - our weekly email newsletter. You can sign upat the top or bottom of our website.

settings.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Discover, Amex) and Paypal.
